summary:
Highly qualified professional with over 14 years of experience in Sales and FP&A activities. 
Throughout my career, I have gained valuable expertise working with international and renowned 
companies. My strong knowledges are in Business Analysis, Sales, Finance and Marketing. Over the 
years, I developed my skills in Financial results and Forecast coordination, enabling me to develop 
essential soft skills such as flexibility, resilience and adaptability.

education.degree_name: Graduate Studies in Finance & Business Efficiency

school.name: ESPM Escola Superior de Propaganda e Marketing

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

profile_positions.title: FP&A Coordinator & Team Leader
FP&A Coordinator & Team Leader
Planning FP&A Specialist
FP&A Senior Professional

profile_positions.description:
• Diligently served as a Revenue Assurance analyst, specializing in comprehensive analysis of 
the customer database to ensure data accuracy and integrity;
• Conducted detailed analysis and effectively managed revenue collection negative impacts, 
resulted from customer data errors;
• Skilfully managed key performance indicators (KPIs) and designed action plans for revenue 
assurance, collaborating closely with cross-functional departments including Customer 
Service, Finance, IT, Accounting, and Billing;
• Actively represented Intelig Telecom as a member of the Telecom Customer Database 
Workgroup, a multi-company consortium assembled by the government through ANATEL. 
Participated in discussions that aimed to minimize revenue impacts associated with errors 
and fraudulent activities related to customer database information.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
